t: Curvy Kate Women's Plus Size Balconette at Amazon Women’s Clothing store: Bras
s: I did have to return a bunch of bras to find my actual correct bra size. I thought I was going to be a 4D, but turns out I'm between an H and HH (like whoa!) Also, the sizing here is listed as UK, so just be aware of that when you purchase these; Curvy Kate is a UK brand.

t: Curvy Kate Bras and Lingerie – BraForMe
s: Curvy Kate lingerie is a specialist in D - K cup bras and swimwear. Designed for the curvy woman, from small back sizes to plus size bras, their back bands 28" - 44" are sure to have you covered. Shop Curvy Kate bras, as well as Curvy Kate sale items, in our Curvy Kate outlet.
Online shopping from a great selection at Curvy Kate Store.

September 22, 2024 - Curvy Kate is a lingerie brand specialising in D – K cup Bras and Swimwear. They are currently based in Uxbridge, London. Curvy Kate lingerie is designed for the curvy woman and for small back sizes through to plus size bras with back bands from a 28" – 44".

Curvy Kate provides beautiful designs for the fuller bust. Available in D to K cup in sizes 6-22, you are bound to find the perfect fit! Curvy women have fallen in love with the supportive shape and sexier style of full-figured lingerie.
